content: live a dream blanket pattern us terminology edited 26/03/2019 general info absolutely adorable pattern live a dream will not let you to get bored it has many different textured stitches that create this beautiful blanket the pattern will look gorgeous using not only several different solid colors but also ombre one solid color cakes or long gradient yarn you can use this pattern to create a baby blanket or lap blanket or you can join squares together to create a stunning king size bed cover the pattern is appropriate for the intermediate level crocheters for more experienced ones this would be a relaxing project the pattern includes detailed descriptions stitch guide video tutorial pictures after every few rounds and to demonstrate the final result i invite you to join crochet patterns by bebablanket facebook group where you can find the picture of the pattern after each round stitches & abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring chain chain st stitch surface slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch space space single_crochet single_crochet btsc back top single_crochet blosc back loop only single_crochet fpsc front post single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet bthdc back top half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet flodc front loop only double_crochet fpexdc front post extended double_crochet pop popcorn 5dc starting pop ch3 4dc into the same st please note that all popcorn stitches end with chain that closes popcorn this chain is not written separately in the pattern popcorn if you need more assistance to see how to crochet a popcorn please watch a video tutorial stitch guide video tutorial ♡ https //linktr ee/bebablanket ♡ 1 additional information beginning ch3 counts as a double_crochet beginning ch2 counts as a half_double_crochet at the end of some rounds ch1 1sc into the top chain of ch3 or ch2 or single_crochet counts as ch2 corner space more information about perfect granny - practical solution 1 double_crochet x 2 = 1 double_crochet into the next two st the same applies to any number of double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet and other st 5dc = 5dc into the next one stitch the same applies to any number of double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet and other st you will need scissors & stitch markers yarn colors hook & approximate size live a dream pattern sample was created using #3 yarn light weight/dk 100 % acrylic hook size 4 5 mm pink shades 4 colors pink 50 g 130 m/142 yd rose 50 g 130 m/142 yd dirty pink 50g 130m/142 yd pink variegated alize burcum batik 100 g 210 m/230 yd purple shades 3 colors light purple 100 g 210 m/230 yd purple 50 g 130 m/142 yd plum 50 g 130 m/142 yd total 450 g 1070 m /1170 yd the sample size 42 rounds including border = 30 in 75 cm square before blocking you can use any yarn & hook you like that suits your project color change the pattern is written as per one color the sample was created changing colors on each round if you change the colors cut the previous color
